price: 38. Oh Nkolo wa biso! Ya sólo penza, oyebi maye mabombami o mitema mia biso na maye tomonisaka polele, mpe eloko te ekoki kobombamela Allah ezala na nsé to na likolo.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ تَعۡلَمُ مَا نُخۡفِي وَمَا نُعۡلِنُۗ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā innaka taʿlamu mā nukh'fī wamā nuʿ'linu wamā yakhfā ʿalā al-lahi min shayin fī al-arḍi walā fī al-samāi
